name: Vuvuzela Button
description:
Drive your friends crazy with the Vuvuzela Button, the world's most ANNOYING HORN!

The Vuvuzela Button contains two buttons:
(1) The Vuvuzela Button lets you play a massive blast from the magnificent instrument
(2) Stadium Vuvuzela Button simulates the chaotic sound of a South African football stadium full of Vuvuzelas!

Features / instructons:
- Vuvuzela Button: Touch to blast it loud as many times as you like!
-Stadium Vuvuzela Button: Hold it down for as long as you want to experience the ultra-realistic & annoying South African football stadium ambience. Drive friends crazy!
